message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product which I believe would be highly valuable to you. I'm asking for $14,000. What do you think?
I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking to save as much as possible. I'm willing to pay $11,000 for the product. Can you consider this offer?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your desire to save, but $11,000 is quite a bit below its true value.  Could we meet in the middle at $13,000?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still looking to save some more. I'm willing to pay $12,200 for the product. Can you consider this offer?
